contentrichtext.text: '''Jalacingo''' is a city in the [[Mexican state]] of [[Veracruz]], bordered by [[Tlapacoyan]], [[Perote (Veracruz)|Perote]] and [[AtzalÃ¡n]] and on [[Mexican Federal Highway|Federal Highways 180 & 190]]. It was founded by [[Gonzalo de Sandoval]]. In Jalacingo the main indigenous language is [[Nahuatl]]. == External links == * {{es icon}} [http://www.jalacingo.gob.mx Municipal Official Site] * {{es icon}} [http://portal.veracruz.gob.mx/portal/page?_pageid=153,4493464&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL&municipio=jalacingo.pdf Municipal Official Information] {{coord|19|48|N|97|18|W|region:MX_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Veracruz]] {{Veracruz-geo-stub}} {{Veracruz}}
